name: pal-pad
effect: Contains friend codes for up to 32 other players, as well as their sprite, gender, and basic statistics for those that have been seen on WFC.
short_effect: Use to record Friend Codes and check your own.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A convenient notepad that is used for
registering your friends and keeping a
record of game play.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
A convenient notepad that is used for
registering your friends, Friend Codes,
and keeping a record of game play.
